DOC.detailed_description: This prospective longitudinal study assess impact repeat Cologuard test 3 year average risk patient . Enrolled subject prescribe Cologuard per approve label baseline . Subjects positive result refer colonoscopy study participation complete . Subjects negative Cologuard result see annually 3 year . At year 3 , subject repeat Cologuard , follow colonoscopy , regardless Cologuard test outcome . Subjects colonoscopy time study discontinue follow collection colonoscopy associate histopathology result .
